casebody.data:
POINDEXTER, INC.
v.
BOARDWALK, et al. No. 443PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2007. L. Holmes Eleazer, Jr., Charlotte, Fenton T. Erwin, Jr., Lex M. Erwin, Jacksonville, for Poindexter. Martin L. White, Charlotte, for Boardwalk, et al. D. Christopher Osborn, Charlotte, for Individual Unit Owners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2007 by Defendants for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendants (Boardwalk, LLC) shall have up to and including the 25th day of April 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of March 2007."
